dct_title_s: Map of the country bordering the Great Trunk Road between Benares and Dehli : based on the Great Trigangulation and Revenue Survey Operations to 1857
dct_description_sm: Extracted from an unfinished map of the N W Provinces under compilation in the Surveyor General's Office Calcutta December 1857.; Includes polymatrical table of distances in the Bengal presidency, taken from Allen's map of India published in 1853 and staging bungalows from Benares to Dehli, and Agra to Nurbudda.; Lithographed by H.M. Smith at the Surveyor General's Office, Calcutta January 1858.
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
